query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO DN_RFC_DESCRIPTION (NAME, DESCRIPTION, IS_SITE_VISIBLE, STUDY_ID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE DN_RFC_DESCRIPTION SET NAME = ?, DESCRIPTION = ?, IS_SITE_VISIBLE = ?, STUDY_ID = ? WHERE DN_RFC_DESCRIPTION_ID = ?

query.name: findAllByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM DN_RFC_DESCRIPTION WHERE STUDY_ID=? ORDER BY DN_RFC_DESCRIPTION_ID
